title: Dashworks (YC W20) Is Hiring a Senior Product Engineer
description:
About the role
As an early engineer to join our team, you'll have the opportunity to materially impact and scale not just the company's product but also the team and the culture. You'll get to drive key product initiatives end to end, and work alongside exceptionally strong co-workers who learn quickly and ship quality work.
You qualify if you have:
3+ years experience using SPA frameworks like React and Typescript for production-grade web apps
1+ years experience with Python
Experience designing microservices with restful APIs
Experience with test-driven development
Experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, GraphQL a plus
Familiarity with SQL and database abstractions
Ability to quickly learn new frameworks/technologies and move across the stack when necessary
What we look for:
Willingness and comfort with owning and driving major initiatives independently
Curiosity and a love for your craft
An intuitive grasp for product-level thinking and system thinking
Strong communication skills
Benefits
We're working hard to create a working environment where people feel empowered to do their very best work, make a significant impact, and enjoy what they do. As an early employee, you'll have a massive say in defining the sales organization, our vision, and our culture. You'll also have uncapped opportunities for progression, learning, and exposure to different business areas.
Here are the Dashworks essential benefits:
A competitive salary - regularly reviewed to make sure you're always getting what you deserve.
Meaningful pre-Series A share options (you'll own a part of Dashworks and share in our success)
Healthcare, vision, dental, and mental health coverage
Home office setup + hardware/software coverage: Get a laptop, and whatever hardware, software, or services you need and are reasonable to do your job.
Option to move from our sunny loft in SOMA in SF. We'll cover relocation if you prefer to move.
Unlimited PTO
Quarterly team retreats
About Dashworks
Today, teams are drowning in a sea of information that is siloed across hundreds of apps (think Notion, Salesforce, Slack, Gmail ...). Finding information across these silos, and making sense of all of it, takes up most of our time as knowledge workers! But what if we could turn these silos into insights with one click, and bring the power of a company's collective knowledge to every team member's fingertips?
In doing so, Dashworks is on a path to redesign the future of collaboration and knowledge sharing at work. We have reached a pivotal stage in our journey: we have an impressive set of early customers, and we just went out of stealth and are growing rapidly!
The team
Dashworks was started by Praty (https://www.linkedin.com/in/pratyaksh) and Prasad (https://www.linkedin.com/in/prasadkawthekar/), who met as grad students working on deep learning. Our team brings product and engineering experience from foremost institutions like Google, Stanford, Microsoft, Facebook, Linkedin, Snap, and Carnegie Mellon. In addition, we are thrilled to be backed by some of the world's best investors like Y Combinator, South Park Commons, Combine, Point 72 Ventures, Goat Capital, Garuda Ventures, founders of companies like Twitch, Mercury, and Gusto, and an amazing crew of angels.
